scripts.package: chmod +x ./build.sh && ./build.sh && tar -cvzf hello-node.tar.gz dist/* && rm -rf dist
scripts.builddockerimage: cp index.js docker/ && cp package.json docker/ && docker build --build-arg ARCH=linux/amd64 -f docker/Dockerfile -t shashi27/hello-world-nodejs:latest . && docker push shashi27/hello-world-nodejs:latest
